title: How do YOU pronounce "Rattata"?
body:
It seems every video I watch, every person I hear say its name, says it differently. This even includes the anime, where even they can't decide on how to pronounce it.

I've heard 

* Rat-at-at
* Rat-a-taw
* Rat-a-tat-tat (Hello Twitch)

And much more that I couldn't hope to convey through text.

So, how do YOU pronounce it?
